column1: The Purple Pig////- Half duck: WOW
column2: this was SO good. You get a little bit of the gamey duck taste but it is so mellow and fits so well with the greek yogurt
column3: it's kind of sinful. Makes you almost think you can never eat chicken again because this is the superior poultry. I would highly recommend getting this! Side note: this came with brioche buns but honestly if this came with soft baozi it would truly elevate this dish. However
column4: this is not an Asian restaurant -- I get it. But think about it
